about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an atmospheric psychological horror with a haunting VHS aesthetic. As a night-shift waitress at a secluded roadside café, serve strange patrons and feel mounting dread. Each night, the nightmare becomes more real, and someone is watching from the darkness. Can you survive?
This is the first episode of the series, more will be coming soon.

A STORY THAT COULD HAPPEN TO ANY OF US

Mary is an eighteen-year-old girl who has been forced to move out of her parents' home and take a job as a waitress at a roadside café to pay for housing and food.

DO YOUR WORK AS A WAITRESS

As it happens, you're the only employee on the night shift. Take orders, prepare food and serve customers, and don't forget to clean up at the end of the shift.

DRIVE A CAR TO GET WHERE YOU NEED TO GO

Living in a trailer park it's not easy to get to work, good thing it was possible to get an inexpensive car.

TALK TO YOUR CUSTOMERS AND THE PEOPLE AROUND YOU

Working with people you can always hear a lot of new and interesting things, who knows what information can help at the right time.

SOMEONE'S ALREADY WATCHING YOU

It always gets scarier with the coming of darkness, it even feels like someone is looking at you from the darkness..... or it's not just a feeling.

Key Features

  • Atmospheric environment.
  • VHS film aesthetic.
  • Psychological horror.
  • Immersive experience.
